content: the mesh bottle holder is a lovely way to use up your scrap yarn you can crochet it in neutral colors for a timeless classic or choose adventurous bright colors for a statement piece it s worked super quickly and the instructions will tell you how to fit different-sized-bottles it ll make a lovely gift for yourself or a dear one overview language - english & italian level - beginner techniques used - chain single_crochet slip_stitch made working continuously in the round materials yarn i used scrap yarn cotton for the softness yet durability i suggest choosing a fingering weight yarn 2 strands held together tools required 4 0mm crochet hook scrap yarn to mark the rounds tapestry needle scissors this pattern is written and created by me and has not been pattern tested so please allow for human errors as they are inevitable please contact me if you have any questions or concerns i d be more than happy to answer your questions please tag me in your photos i d love to see your creations happy crocheting nene ^
